roleset.name: use position as an advantage

example.name: transtive
example.text: [Few, if any, index-fund managers]-1 will risk *trace*-1 leveraging performance by owning more than 100 % exposure to stocks, and equally few will want to own less than a 100% position should stocks rise.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'leverage' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry (surprise, surprise). No comparison.
